availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in 1816 in Tennessee. Farmer. Family included Eliza A., David N., and James. Died in 1870 in Trigg County, Kentucky.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Trigg, family 112; "Find A Grave Index," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QVVT-G7M8 : 13 December 2015), William S. Watwood, ; Burial, , Trigg, Kentucky, United States of America, Atwood-McNichols Cemetery; citing record ID 28055082, Find a Grave, http://www.findagrave.com.
